S.FORM: Confekonhoko Gaga kska Meycow ka Central african republic, 7 00 N, 21 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 622,984 sq km(hangan na o Tg45) (knlbanga dxgal o 622,984 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 0 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 5,507,257 hiyi. Gaga Bangui ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 1 idas 12 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Central african republic ga wada sugan 8.10 ka dxgal qpahan, 36.20 ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 55.70 na.
